verses.name: Jeremiah 51:48
verses.text: Then the heaven and the earth, and all that is therein, shall sing for Babylon: for the spoilers shall come unto her from the north, saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:49
verses.text: As Babylon hath caused the slain of Israel to fall, so at Babylon shall fall the slain of all the earth.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:50
verses.text: Ye that have escaped the sword, go away, stand not still: remember the Lord afar off, and let Jerusalem come into your mind.

verses.name: Jeremiah 51:51
verses.text: We are confounded, because we have heard reproach: shame hath covered our faces: for strangers are come into the sanctuaries of the Lord’s house.
